title: Update mobile number label to 'Reg. Mobile No.'

requirements.text: Update the ContactSection component to display the mobile number with the prefix 'Reg. Mobile No.7079860205' instead of 'Mob. No.7079860205'
acceptanceCriteria: The contact information display shows 'Reg. Mobile No.7079860205' for the phone number
The email continues to display as 'gmail-thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' with the gmail- prefix
No other contact information formatting is changed

constraints: Do not modify the backend ContactInfo data structure or values
Preserve the existing email formatting with 'gmail-' prefix
Only change the mobile number label prefix from 'Mob. No.' to 'Reg. Mobile No.'
nonGoals: Changing the actual phone number or email address values
Updating backend logic or data structures
